name: Beat Warrior
description:
Hey!

This is the first playable demo of my Rhythm Beat 'em Up game Beat Warrior.

I hope you'll enjoy this early version. Any feedback is of course welcome!

There are currently 2 songs: the tutorial song and Crab Rave by Noisestorm. In the next releases, people will be able to make and share their own beatmaps.

If you're struggling with Crab Rave, that's normal (I struggled too). Don't hesitate to watch the video at 0.75 or 0.5 speed if you have trouble understanding the patterns (link: https://youtu.be/Ax1RnCznsm0)

Menu music: Mandala Dreams - Oku No In

Controls:

You can move using

  • The arrow keys of your keyboard
  • WASD (or ZQSD for French folks)
  • Any stick or d-pad of a controller (untested)

You can also combine them (like using both hands on the keyboard or using two sticks on a controller)

Platforms available:

  • Windows
  • Linux
  • Mac (untested)

Note: Chrome and Windows may tell you that the game can be dangerous, because I didn't take the time to make it trusted. And on Windows, I couldn't hide the black console window, sorry about that...

The game was made using Godot 3 and suffers from some limitations of the engine, so next release probably won't be until Godot 4 is out.
